fields.content: Object.entries(@permission).filter(entry => entry[1] === 3).map(entry => entry[0]).map(id => !game.users.get(id)?.isGM ? game.users.get(id)?.name : null).filter(x => x).join(", ")

@items.filter(i => i.type === 'spell' && i.system.level === 2)[0]?.name || "" }, 
    { "pdf": "Zauber2_2",  "foundry": @items.filter(i => i.type === 'spell' && i.system.level === 2)[1]?.name || "" },
